name: Automate Video Creation from Voice Input with HeyGen, GPT-5 & Social Publishing

user.name: Dr. Firas
user.bio: Automation expert and certified trainer. I create hands-on courses to master automation with n8n. Contact me to access my exclusive training and start building powerful workflows today. üöÄ

description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.*

![Workflow Screenshot](https://www.dr-firas.com/HeyGen_II.png)

# Automate Video Creation from Voice Input with HeyGen & n8n

---

### üë• Who is this for?

This workflow is ideal for:  
- Content creators who want to turn ideas into videos in minutes  
- Marketers managing multi-platform video campaigns  
- Agencies needing scalable video workflows for multiple clients  
- Entrepreneurs looking to automate social media presence  

---

### üí° What problem is this workflow solving?

Creating and publishing videos across TikTok, YouTube, Instagram and more is:  
- Time-consuming (writing scripts, creating videos, uploading manually)  
- Inconsistent (different platforms, formats, captions)  
- Hard to scale without automation  

This workflow solves it by **turning a voice note into a complete AI video** ‚Äî scripted, generated, and published automatically.  

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è What this workflow does

1. **Capture idea via Telegram voice note**  
2. **Transcribe audio to text** using OpenAI Whisper  
3. **Generate script, title, and caption** with GPT-5  
4. **Create avatar video** with HeyGen based on your script  
5. **Save final video** to Google Drive and log metadata in Google Sheets  
6. **Upload video** to Blotato  
7. **Auto-publish** to 9 platforms (TikTok, YouTube Shorts, Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter (X), Threads, Bluesky, Pinterest)  
8. **Send Telegram notification** once published  

---

### üß∞ Setup

Before you start, you‚Äôll need:  
1. ‚úÖ A **Telegram Bot** connected to n8n  
2. üîë An **OpenAI API key** (Whisper + GPT-5)  
3. üé≠ A **HeyGen API key** for avatar video generation  
4. üìÇ **Google Drive + Sheets integrations** for storage & logs  
5. üß© A **Blotato Pro account** with API access enabled  
6. üì¶ **Verified Community Nodes** enabled in n8n Admin Panel  
7. ‚öôÔ∏è Blotato node installed + credentials configured  
8. üìÑ A Google Sheet template to log titles, captions, and video links  

---

### üõ†Ô∏è How to customize this workflow

- **Change prompts** ‚Üí Adjust GPT-5 prompts to fit your tone or brand  
- **Select avatars** ‚Üí Configure HeyGen avatar and voice to match your style  
- **Choose platforms** ‚Üí Activate only TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, etc.  
- **Add approvals** ‚Üí Insert a Telegram or Slack approval step before publishing  
- **Extend reporting** ‚Üí Push analytics or engagement data into Sheets or Notion  

---

This workflow transforms a **simple voice message** into a **ready-to-publish viral video** ‚Äî fully automated, consistent, and scalable.  

---
üìÑ **Documentation**: [Notion Guide](https://automatisation.notion.site/HeyGen-2563d6550fd980ee8e56c064c42177a3?source=copy_link)

---

### Need help customizing?
Contact me for consulting and support : [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [Youtube](https:/https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

parameters.content:
# üé¨ Automate Video Creation from Voice Input with HeyGen & n8n

Turn a simple idea into a **viral video** and auto-publish it across platforms using  
**GPT-5**, **HeyGen**, **Blotato**, **Google Sheets**, and **n8n**.  

---

### üé• Full Tutorial  
[![Watch on YouTube](https://img.youtube.com/vi/6Pzw_NC2GfY/hqdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/6Pzw_NC2GfY)  
üëâ [Click here to watch the full YouTube tutorial](https://youtu.be/6Pzw_NC2GfY)

---

### üìò Documentation  
Access detailed setup instructions, API config, platform connection guides, and workflow customization tips:

üìé [Open the full documentation on Notion](https://automatisation.notion.site/Blotato-2473d6550fd980e19983f69611a80a0d?source=copy_link)

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Requirements

1. ‚úÖ **Create a [Blotato](https://blotato.com/?ref=firas) account** (Pro plan required for API access)  
2. üîë **Generate your Blotato API Key** via: `Settings > API > Generate API Key`  
3. üì¶ **Enable ‚ÄúVerified Community Nodes‚Äù** in the n8n admin settings  
4. üß© **Install the Blotato** verified community node in n8n  
5. üõ† **Create a Blotato API credential** inside your n8n credentials tab  
6. üìÑ **Duplicate this [Google Sheet template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hINQ6xYqxYVXcyVUOs69VV9CiarGUshj5eL8wr7yH24/edit?usp=sharing)**  
7. ‚òÅÔ∏è **Make sure your Google Drive folder is PUBLIC** (anyone with the link can access)  
8. üìå **Complete the 3 brown sticky note steps** inside the workflow editor

nodes.name: AI Agent - Generate Title & Caption & Script

options.systemMessage:
=You will first create a "script to read" (maximum 100 words) that directly answers the request contained in the TRANSCRIPTION. The script must stay faithful to the TRANSCRIPTION, no invention, no external info.

The script must be written with a motivating and inspiring tone, as it will be read in a presentation video shared on social media. It should sound engaging and encourage the audience to take interest.

Then, based on this script, you will create a concise Title and a short Caption. Detect the language from the TRANSCRIPTION and write in that same language. No emojis. No hashtags.

RULES:
- Script: ‚â§ 100 words, clear, faithful, aligned with TRANSCRIPTION.
- Title: clear, compelling, faithful to the script. Aim ‚â§ 70 characters. No clickbait. No emojis/hashtags.
- Caption: ‚â§ 200 characters (characters, not words). Crisp, adds context or a takeaway. No emojis/hashtags.
- Keep all content aligned with TRANSCRIPTION. Do not add external info.

FINAL OUTPUT (single line JSON):
{"script":"<SCRIPT TO READ>", "title":"<TITLE>", "caption":"<CAPTION>"}


TRANSCRIPTION:
{{ $json.text }}

Use the Google Sheets tool to save the generated script, title and caption for this video.

nodes.name: Google Sheets - Update Title & Caption & Script
